DESCRIPTION:

It’s summer break and it’s time to show off your stuff! The local skate celebs are hosting a tournament down at the pier and you’ve been training for this very moment all your life! Head on down and skate ‘till you drop!

Sk8 to the Beat is a unique Rhythm and Skateboarding game where you must avoid obstacles and time your skate tricks to the beat of an original skate punk soundtrack! Dodge, ollie, pop shove-it, heel-flip, and most importantly, skate your way to victory while listening to three catchy tracks made by skate punks for skate punks!

Are you punk enough? Well, I’d sure hope so because if you let your Punkometer get too low everyone at the pier will think you’re nothing but a poser! Keep your meter up by successfully performing tricks and avoiding obstacles. If you hit an obstacle or miss a trick your meter will be lowered until there’s not a single ounce of punk left in your body! You’ll truly know how punk you are when you get to see the look on the judges’ faces as they observe your run through each track. 

Sk8 to the Beat offers a fresh take to both the rhythm and skateboarding genres with its creative fusion, sketchy art style, and uncensored soundtrack. Each art asset has been painstakingly hand-drawn by members of the development team - offering a harmonious relationship between art and gameplay. The music has also been written by members of the development team.
